summary.span: 顯示單一月份的行事曆，讓使用者可以選取日期並移至下個月或上個月。

span.span: Displays a single-month calendar that enables the user to select dates and move to the next or previous month.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#Introduction) - [協助工具選項Accessibility](#Accessibility) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 簡介Introduction 使用在網頁上顯示單一月份的行事曆控制項。Use the control to display a single month of a calendar on a Web page. 控制項可讓您選取日期並移至下一個或上一個月份。The control allows you to select dates and move to the next or previous month. 控制項支援所有中的型別命名空間。The control supports all the types in the namespace. 除了西曆，這也包括使用不同的年份和月份系統，例如回曆的行事曆。Apart from the Gregorian calendar, this also includes calendars that use different year and month systems, such as the Hjiri calendar. 您可以指定是否控制項可讓您藉由設定選取一天、 週或整個月屬性。You can specify whether the control allows you to select a single day, week, or entire month by setting the property. 根據預設，控制項會顯示每月天數，day 標題天數的每週的月份和年份、 選取個別日期的月份，連結和連結移至下一步] 和 [上一個月份的標題。By default, the control displays the days of the month, day headings for the days of the week, a title with the month name and year, links for selecting individual days of the month, and links for moving to the next and previous month. 您可以自訂的外觀藉由設定控制控制項的不同部分的樣式屬性的控制項。You can customize the appearance of the control by setting the properties that control the style for different parts of the control. 下表列出的屬性，指定控制項的不同部分的樣式。The following table lists the properties that specify the style for the different parts of the control. |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||指定之區段會顯示一周天數的樣式。Specifies the style for the section that displays the days of the week.| ||指定在顯示的月份日期的樣式。Specifies the style for the dates in the displayed month.| ||指定標題區段中的導覽控制項的樣式。Specifies the style for the navigation controls in the title section.| ||指定不在目前顯示的月份日期的樣式。Specifies the style for the dates that are not in the currently displayed month.| ||指定在行事曆上的選取日期的樣式。Specifies the style for the selected dates on the calendar.| ||指定的週和月份選取日期資料行的樣式。Specifies the style for the week and month date-selection column.| ||指定的樣式標題區段。Specifies the style for the title section.| ||指定今天日期的樣式。Specifies the style for today's date.| ||指定週末日期的樣式。Specifies the style for the weekend dates.| 您也可以顯示或隱藏的控制項的不同部分。You can also show or hide different parts of the control. 下表列出可控制哪些部分要顯示或隱藏的屬性。The following table lists the properties that control which parts are shown or hidden. |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||顯示或隱藏顯示一周天數的區段。Shows or hides the section that displays the days of the week.| ||顯示或隱藏每月天數間的格線。Shows or hides the gridlines between the days of the month.| ||顯示或隱藏的一個或下一個月份的導覽控制項。Shows or hides the navigation controls to the next or previous month.| ||顯示或隱藏標題區段。Shows or hides the title section.| 雖然不支援繫結至資料來源控制項，您可以修改內容和個別的日期資料格的格式。Although binding to a data source is not supported for the control, you can modify the content and formatting of the individual date cells. 之前在網頁上顯示控制項時，它會建立組合構成控制項的元件。Before the control is displayed on the Web page, it creates and assembles the components that make up the control. 就會引發事件時每個日期儲存格建立控制項。The event is raised when each date cell in the control is created. 您可以控制內容和格式的日期 儲存格，因為它提供的事件處理常式的程式碼會建立事件。You can control the contents and formatting of a date cell as it is created by providing code in the event handler for the event. 如需有關自訂的日期 儲存格內容的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on customizing the contents of a date cell, see . > [!NOTE] > 控制項呈現的 ECMAScript （JScript、 JavaScript） 用戶端瀏覽器。The control renders ECMAScript (JScript, JavaScript) to the client browser. 用戶端瀏覽器必須要有 ECMAScript 啟用此控制項的正常運作。The client browser must have ECMAScript enabled for this control to function properly. 如需有關用戶端指令碼的詳細資訊，請參閱[用戶端指令碼中的 ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13edb6b9-2dea-43c6-b8c1-a47207de19aa)。For more information on client script, see [Client Script in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13edb6b9-2dea-43c6-b8c1-a47207de19aa). ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 協助工具標準，可能不符合呈現，根據預設，此控制項的標記。The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards. 如需對這個控制項的協助工具支援的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立網頁上的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control on a Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewConcepts#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewConcepts/CS/gridviewcustomcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewConcepts#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewConcepts/VB/gridviewcustomvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料表標題用來描述本質的一到三個句子中的資料表。A table caption is used to describe the nature of the table in one to three sentences. 使用具有行事曆的標題的對齊屬性。Use the property to align the caption with the calendar. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性顯示的標題控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display a caption for a control. value.span: 值，表示標題的對齊方式。

span.span: A value that indicates the alignment of the caption.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會決定出現在標題控制項。This property determines where the caption appears in relation to the control. 預設值是，可讓瀏覽器判斷標題的對齊的位置。The default value is , which lets the browser determine where to align the caption. 下表說明之間的關聯性值和標題的外觀。The following table explains the relationship between the value and the appearance of the caption. | 值 value|外觀Appearance| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------| |`Bottom`|底部的行事曆 的標題是以文字置中顯示。The caption appears at the bottom of the calendar, with the text centered.| |`Left`|標題會出現在頂端的 行事曆，靠左對齊的文字。The caption appears at the top of the calendar, with the text left-aligned.| |`NotSet`|標題對齊方式未設定，取決於瀏覽器。The caption alignment is not set and is determined by the browser.| |`Right`|標題會出現在頂端的 行事曆，靠右對齊的文字。The caption appears at the top of the calendar, with the text right-aligned.| |`Top`|頂端的行事曆的標題是以文字置中顯示。The caption appears at the top of the calendar with the text centered.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用對齊的標題屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to align a caption for a control. summary.span: 發生於各個日期在 控制項的控制項階層架構中建立時。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每一天建立的控制項階層架構中時，會引發這個事件控制項。This event is raised when each day is created in the control hierarchy for the control. 雖然不支援資料繫結控制項，就能修改內容的個別的日期資料格的格式。Although data binding is not supported for the control, it is possible to modify the content and formatting of the individual date cells. 之前在網頁上顯示控制項時，它會建立組合構成控制項的元件。Before the control is displayed on the Web page, it creates and assembles the components that make up the control. 就會引發事件時每個日期儲存格建立控制項。The event is raised when each date cell in the control is created. 您可以控制內容和格式的日期 儲存格時提供的事件處理常式的程式碼會建立事件。You can control the contents and formatting of a date cell when it is created by providing code in the event handler for the event. 如需有關自訂的日期 儲存格內容的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on customizing the contents of a date cell, see . > [!NOTE] > 因為就會引發事件時呈現控制項，您無法加入的控制項，可能也會引發事件，例如。Because the event is raised while the control is being rendered, you cannot add a control that can also raise an event, such as . 您只能新增靜態控制項，例如， ， ，和。You can only add static controls, such as , , , and . 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件，讓背景的黃色中顯示的月份日期。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to make the background color yellow for the days in the displayed month. 它也會示範如何加入自訂資料格內容控制項加入儲存格。It also demonstrates how to customize the contents of a cell by adding a control to the cell. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性以提供自訂文字的下一個月份導覽控制項。Use the property to provide custom text for the next month navigation control. 這個屬性通常用於連同屬性提供一組自訂的導覽控制項。This property is commonly used along with the property to provide a custom set of navigation controls. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性不會自動編碼為 HTML。This property does not automatically encode to HTML. 您需要特殊字元轉換成適當的 HTML 值，除非您想要視為 HTML 中的字元。You need to convert special characters to the appropriate HTML value, unless you want the characters to be treated as HTML. 例如，若要明確顯示大於符號 (>)，您必須使用值`>`。For example, to explicitly display the greater than symbol (>), you must use the value `>`. 這個屬性不會自動編碼為 HTML，因為它是指定之 HTML 標記屬性。Because this property does not automatically encode to HTML, it is possible to specify an HTML tag for the property. 例如，如果您想要顯示的下一個月份巡覽控制項之影像中，您可以設定此屬性包含的運算式``項目。For example, if you want to display an image for the next month navigation control, you can set this property to an expression that contains an `` element. 這個屬性僅適用於屬性設定為`true`。This property applies only if the property is set to `true`. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定自訂文字的下個月的導覽控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify custom text for the navigation control to the next month. remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然不支援資料繫結控制項，就能修改內容的個別的日期資料格的格式。Although data binding is not supported for the control, it is possible to modify the content and formatting of the individual date cells. 之前在網頁上顯示控制項時，它會建立組合構成控制項的元件。Before the control is displayed on the Web page, it creates and assembles the components that make up the control. 就會引發事件時每個日期儲存格建立控制項。The event is raised when each date cell in the control is created. 您可以控制內容和格式的日期 儲存格時提供的事件處理常式的程式碼會建立事件。You can control the contents and formatting of a date cell when it is created by providing code in the event handler for the event. 事件處理常式會接收物件，其中包含事件資料。The event handler receives a object that contains event data. 物件包含兩個屬性可讓您以程式設計方式控制 [日期] 儲存格的格式。The object contains two properties that you can use to programmatically control the format of the date cell. 屬性表示儲存格呈現，而屬性表示的日期資料格中轉譯。The property represents the cell being rendered, while the property represents the date to render in the cell. 您也可以由以動態方式將控制項加入自訂資料格內容集合屬性。You can also customize the contents of a cell by dynamically adding controls to the collection of the property. > [!NOTE] > 因為就會引發事件時呈現控制項，您無法加入的控制項，可能也會引發事件，例如。Because the event is raised while the control is being rendered, you cannot add a control that can also raise an event, such as . 您只能新增靜態控制項，例如， ， ，和。You can only add static controls, such as , , , and . 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。For more information, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件，讓背景的黃色中顯示的月份日期。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to make the background color yellow for the days in the displayed month. 它也會示範如何加入自訂資料格內容控制項加入儲存格。It also demonstrates how to customize the contents of a cell by adding a control to the cell. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者按一下以選取一天、 週或整個月份的日期選擇器控制項時，就會引發事件。The event is raised when the user selects a day, a week, or an entire month by clicking the date selector controls. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。For more information, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件顯示在選取的項目數量控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to display the number of items selected in the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性以提供自訂文字的上一個月份導覽控制項。Use the property to provide custom text for the previous month navigation control. 這個屬性通常用於連同屬性提供一組自訂的導覽控制項。This property is commonly used along with the property to provide a custom set of navigation controls. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性不會自動編碼為 HTML。This property does not automatically encode to HTML. 您需要特殊字元轉換成適當的 HTML 值，除非您想要視為 HTML 中的字元。You need to convert special characters to the appropriate HTML value, unless you want the characters to be treated as HTML. 例如，若要明確顯示大於符號 (>)，您必須使用值`>`。For example, to explicitly display the greater than symbol (>), you must use the value `>`. 這個屬性不會自動編碼為 HTML，因為它是指定之 HTML 標記屬性。Because this property does not automatically encode to HTML, it is possible to specify an HTML tag for the property. 例如，如果您想要顯示的下一個月份巡覽控制項之影像中，您可以設定此屬性包含的運算式``項目。For example, if you want to display an image for the next month navigation control, you can set this property to an expression that contains an `` element. 這個屬性僅適用於屬性設定為`true`。This property applies only if the property is set to `true`. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定上一個月份瀏覽控制項的自訂文字。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify custom text for the previous month navigation control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷所選取的日期上控制項。Use the property to determine the selected date on the control. 屬性和集合密切相關。The property and the collection are closely related. 當屬性設定為`CalendarSelectionMode.Day`，允許只有單一日期選項的模式和`SelectedDates[0]`具有相同的值和`SelectedDates.Count`等於 1。When the property is set to `CalendarSelectionMode.Day`, a mode that allows only a single date selection, and `SelectedDates[0]` have the same value and `SelectedDates.Count` equals 1. 當屬性設定為`CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek`或`CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`，模式，可讓多個日期選擇範圍，和`SelectedDates[0]`具有相同的值。When the property is set to `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek` or `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`, modes that allows multiple date selections, and `SelectedDates[0]` have the same value. 屬性會設定使用物件。The property is set using a object. 當使用者選取日期上控制項，就會引發事件。When the user selects a date on the control, the event is raised. 會更新屬性以選取的日期。The property is updated to the selected date. 集合也會更新以包含剛才此日期。The collection is also updated to contain just this date. > [!NOTE] > 這兩個屬性和集合更新之前就會引發事件。Both the property and the collection are updated before the event is raised. 您可以使用覆寫選取日期事件處理常式，以手動方式設定屬性。You can override the date selection by using the event handler to manually set the property. 不未取得引發事件，以程式設計方式設定這個屬性。The event does not get raised when this property is programmatically set. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷所選取的日期上控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the selected date on the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用集合，以判斷要在目前選取的日期控制項。Use the collection to determine the currently selected dates on the control. 屬性和集合密切相關。The property and the collection are closely related. 當屬性設定為`CalendarSelectionMode.Day`，允許只有單一日期選項的模式和`SelectedDates[0]`具有相同的值和`SelectedDates.Count`等於 1。When the property is set to `CalendarSelectionMode.Day`, a mode that allows only a single date selection, and `SelectedDates[0]` have the same value and `SelectedDates.Count` equals 1. 當屬性設定為`CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek`或`CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`，模式，可讓多個日期選擇範圍，和`SelectedDates[0]`具有相同的值。When the property is set to `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek` or `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`, modes that allows multiple date selections, and `SelectedDates[0]` have the same value. 屬性儲存的集合物件。The property stores a collection of objects. 當使用者選取一週或月在控制項，就會引發事件。When the user selects a week or month on the control, the event is raised. 選取的日期會加入至集合，取代先前的內容。The selected dates are added to the collection, replacing the previous contents. 依日期的遞增順序排序的日期範圍。The range of dates are sorted in ascending order by date. 屬性也會更新以包含在第一個日期集合。The property is also updated to contain the first date in the collection. 您也可以使用集合以程式設計方式上選取日期控制項。You can also use the collection to programmatically select dates on the control. 使用， ， ，和方法來以程式設計方式管理中的選取的日期集合。Use the , , , and methods to programmatically manipulate the selected dates in the collection. > [!NOTE] > 這兩個屬性和集合更新之前就會引發事件。Both the property and the collection are updated before the event is raised. 您可以使用覆寫選取日期事件處理常式，以手動方式設定集合。You can override the date selection by using the event handler to manually set the collection. 以程式設計方式設定這個集合時，不會引發事件。The event is not raised when this collection is programmatically set. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用集合，以判斷要在選定的日期控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the collection to determine the selected dates on the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定的日期選取範圍模式控制項。Use the property to specify the date selection mode on the control. 此屬性設為其中一個列舉值。This property is set with one of the enumeration values. 您可以指定使用者可以選取一天、 週或整個月份，或您將可以完全停用日期選取功能。You can specify whether the user can select a single day, a week, or an entire month, or you can disable date-selection capability entirely. 當這個屬性設定為`CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek`或`CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`，包含週和月份選取控制項的其他選擇器資料行，都會在第一個資料行控制項。When this property is set to `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek` or `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`, an additional selector column that contains week and month selection controls is displayed in the first column of the control. 使用屬性來自訂這個資料行的外觀。Use the property to customize the appearance of this column. 若要停用日期選取範圍，將此屬性設定為`CalendarSelectionMode.None`。To disable date selection, set this property to `CalendarSelectionMode.None`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以允許一天、 週或整個月份所選取的日期。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to allow date selection by a single day, a week, or an entire month. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性以提供自訂文字月份選取項目的選取器的資料行中。Use the property to provide custom text for the month selection element in the selector column. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性不會自動編碼為 HTML。This property does not automatically encode to HTML. 您需要特殊字元轉換成適當的 HTML 值，除非您想要視為 HTML 中的字元。You need to convert special characters to the appropriate HTML value, unless you want the characters to be treated as HTML. 例如，若要明確顯示大於符號 (>)，您必須使用值`>`。For example, to explicitly display the greater than symbol (>), you must use the value `>`. 這個屬性不會自動編碼為 HTML，因為它是指定之 HTML 標記屬性。Because this property does not automatically encode to HTML, it is possible to specify an HTML tag for the property. 例如，如果您想要顯示的下一個月份巡覽控制項之影像中，您可以設定此屬性包含的運算式``項目。For example, if you want to display an image for the next month navigation control, you can set this property to an expression that contains an `` element. 這個屬性僅適用於屬性設定為`CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`。This property applies only if the property is set to `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用以提供自訂文字月份選取項目的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to provide custom text for the month selection element. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性以程式設計方式設定要顯示在上個月控制項。Use the property to programmatically set the month to display on the control. 指定的日期可以是任何您想要顯示，但通常會使用月份的第一個日期的月份日期。The specified date can be any date in the month you want to display, although it is common to use the first date in the month. 這個屬性會設定使用物件。This property is set using a object. 之前更新屬性就會引發事件。The property is updated before the event is raised. 您可以提供自訂事件處理常式，以設定屬性，然後覆寫自動產生的值。You can provide a custom event handler to set the property and override the automatically generated value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性以程式設計方式設定的值會決定顯示在該月控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically set the value that determines the month that is displayed in the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者按一下標題上的一個或下一個月份巡覽項目，會引發這個事件。This event is raised when the user clicks the next or previous month navigation elements on the title heading. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式要顯示的事件是否控制項已移往前或往後的一個月。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to display whether the control has moved forward or backward one month.
